rooms.name: Standard_Single
rooms.description: A stylish and cozy single room, the Standard Single is the perfect place for a comfortable stay. With a size of 18 m², it is decorated in a minimalist style, creating a cozy and private atmosphere. The room includes a comfortable single bed and everything you need for your comfort: Wi-Fi, TV, air conditioning, mini-bar, and a kettle. A great choice for those who value simplicity, comfort, and affordability.
rooms.short_description: Cozy single room for one guest

rooms.name: Standard_Double
rooms.description: A classic double room, ideal for a comfortable stay or business trip. The room features a comfortable double bed with quality bedding, a stylish work area for productive work, and a modern interior in soothing tones. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi, a TV with cable channels, a mini-bar, and a safe for storing valuables. Spacious windows provide natural lighting, creating a cozy atmosphere. A great choice for travelers who value comfort and functionality at an affordable price.
rooms.short_description: Classic double room with a comfortable bed

rooms.name: Standard_Twin
rooms.description: A spacious and bright room with two separate beds, perfect for friends, colleagues, or relatives. The room includes all the essentials for a comfortable stay: air conditioning, TV, free Wi-Fi, and a kettle for making hot drinks. The interior design is in modern light tones, creating a relaxing atmosphere. The well-thought-out space zoning allows guests to relax or work comfortably. This room is an excellent option for both short and long-term stays.
rooms.short_description: Spacious room with two separate beds

rooms.name: Standard_Family
rooms.description: A cozy family room designed for the comfortable accommodation of parents with children. The main sleeping area features a large double bed, and there is an additional bed for a child. A crib is available for the youngest guests. The room includes a refrigerator for storing baby food, a TV, Wi-Fi, and a stylish interior with pleasant lighting. The spacious layout allows you to feel at home, and the comfortable furniture ensures a relaxing stay. A great choice for those traveling with the whole family!
rooms.short_description: Spacious family room with an extra bed

rooms.name: Superior_Room
rooms.description: An upgraded comfort room with a spacious double bed, stylish interior, and panoramic view of the city. Guests can enjoy fresh air on their own balcony. For convenience, the room includes Wi-Fi, a safe, a coffee machine, and a work area. The design is done in a modern style with high-quality materials. An excellent option for those who value comfort and convenience during their trips.
rooms.short_description: Comfortable room with upgraded interior, balcony, and city view

rooms.name: Business_Room
rooms.description: This room is ideal for business trips. The space is designed with the needs of business guests in mind: a comfortable work area with a desk, a trouser press, fast Wi-Fi, and a coffee machine for refreshing drinks. A comfortable double bed and a stylish interior provide a relaxing atmosphere after a busy day. A perfect combination of convenience and functionality!
rooms.short_description: Perfect room for business trips with spacious work area and comfortable rest zone

rooms.name: Studio_Suite
rooms.description: A spacious studio suite with a mini-kitchen and a cozy living area, ideal for long stays. The room has a double bed, a comfortable sofa, cooking utensils, and a safe. The modern interior creates a cozy feeling, and the thoughtful layout allows the space to be used as efficiently as possible. A perfect choice for those who value comfort and independence.
rooms.short_description: Spacious studio suite with a mini-kitchen and cozy living area

rooms.name: Eco_Room
rooms.description: An eco-friendly room designed for guests who care about the environment. Natural bi materials are used in the decor, and a water filter eliminates the need for plastic. Guests can enjoy a spacious balcony with a panoramic view, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a stylish interior in natural shades. This room offers harmony with nature without compromising comfort.
rooms.short_description: Eco-friendly room with natural materials and panoramic view

rooms.name: Executive_Room
rooms.description: A modern room with a thoughtful interior, created for guests who value comfort and style. It has panoramic windows, allowing guests to enjoy breathtaking views of the city. The room features a large double bed, a spacious wardrobe for convenient storage, a safe, and a coffee machine. With an ergonomic work space, this room is suitable for both rest and work. Modern design, cozy atmosphere, and high-quality service make this an excellent choice for demanding guests.
rooms.short_description: Modern room with a thoughtful design, improved service, and panoramic windows

rooms.name: Family_Suite
rooms.description: A spacious family suite with two separate bedrooms, ensuring a comfortable stay for parents and children. The room features a relaxing area, a crib, and a play area. Guests can also use the minibar and enjoy free Wi-Fi. This room is ideal for family stays, offering maximum comfort and privacy.
rooms.short_description: Spacious family suite with two rooms and a relaxation area

rooms.name: Romantic_Suite
rooms.description: A room designed specifically for romantic getaways. It features a large double bed, a bathtub with rose petals, and a complimentary bottle of champagne. The atmosphere is completed by pleasant lighting, soft colors, and a cozy atmosphere. This is a perfect place for a relaxing and intimate stay.
rooms.short_description: Romantic suite with a bathtub and rose petals

rooms.name: Junior_Suite
rooms.description: An elegant mini-suite with a spacious living area and a large balcony. The room features a jacuzzi, minibar, comfortable double bed, and a cozy sofa. This room is perfect for those who value comfort and space, as well as those who want to enjoy sophisticated design and top-class service.
rooms.short_description: Mini-suite with a separate living area

rooms.name: Major_Suite
rooms.description: A spacious suite with a separate living area and a magnificent panoramic view. The room includes a jacuzzi, balcony, minibar, and a comfortable sofa. Top-level amenities, stylish interior, and space make this option an excellent choice for luxury connoisseurs.
rooms.short_description: Mini-suite with a separate living area and a large balcony.

rooms.name: Executive_Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious suite with a separate bedroom, spacious living room, and panoramic windows. The room features a jacuzzi, VIP service, personal bar, and butler services. This suite is for those who are accustomed to the highest level of comfort and personalized service.
rooms.short_description: Spacious suite with a separate bedroom, living room, and panoramic windows.

rooms.name: Presidential_Suite
rooms.description: The most luxurious room in the hotel, designed for guests who appreciate exclusive relaxation. The room includes a separate bedroom with a king-size bed, a spacious living room, a private terrace with an amazing view, personal sauna, and pool. Guests also have access to VIP services and a personal butler who will ensure the perfect stay. This room combines absolute comfort, exquisite style, and the highest level of service.
rooms.short_description: Exclusive room for the most discerning guests
